title: Prepare Commercial Sale Marketing Package
description: An agent is listing a commercial building for sale and needs to create a comprehensive marketing package (offering memorandum).

tasks.description: Gather all property information: financials, rent roll, site plan, photos, and market data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete set of data for the property.

tasks.description: Use a template to create the offering memorandum, populating it with the gathered data and analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a professional and detailed marketing package.

tasks.description: Create a confidentiality agreement for interested parties to sign before receiving the full package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a standard confidentiality agreement.
